description: Fractions in Farey series of order n.
links: R. K. Guy, The strong law of small numbers. Amer. Math. Monthly 95 (1988), no. 8, 697-712.
mathematica: a[0] = 0; a[n_] := 1 + Sum[EulerPhi[k], {k, 1, n}]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 60}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 27 2015 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
